channel.title: Perfectscape 317-498
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://pscape.org/images/banner.png[/img] [URL=http://pscape.org/index.php][IMG]http://pscape.org/images/forums.png[/img] [/URL][URL=http://pscape.org/webclient.php][IMG]http://pscape.org/images/webclient.png[/img] [/URL][URL=http://pscape.org/client.jar][IMG]http://pscape.org/images/client.png[/img] [/URL] [/center]
[B]Introduction[/B] PerfectScape is a brand new server, actually just started today. It is based in Rune-Legacy, a server realeased by Genesis, which in my oppinion is a great server and so is PerfectScape. Me and my friend Overhated are the owners. In a certain day i woke up and i really wanted a old school server full of players, i miss a community, people to talk with, and so does my friend. The main reason to create PerfectScape was the need of players and community, of course we will accept donations :P, it's one of the most important things in a server so we can keep the same running without problems.
[B]Some Features[/B]
[ul][*]498 Animations/Gfx [*]498 items [*]498 npcs [*]Summoning [*]Pets [*]Castle Wars(With some glitches) [*]Pest Control [*]Vesta/Statius/Zuriel/Morrigan armours [*]God Wars [*]Music [*]Sounds[/ul] A lot more!
[center] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/83539229/ohyeh.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/83539229/pioip.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/83539229/home.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/83539229/mining%20zone%20%26%20summoning.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/83539229/training%26dungeons.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/83539229/veng.png[/img] [/center]
We will keep updating the server and many content will be changed, this is just the first day, there are many to come : ). We are aiming for 300 players, hope you are one between them : ). We are still getting familiar with the existing content in the server, so we know what changes to make, we will appreaciate a lot if you could help us by reporting glitches. Thank's, hope you join!
